title: Leviathan.007
author: Leviathan.007
created_time: June 14, 2022, 07:46:52 PMLast edit: June 14, 2022, 07:57:58 PM by Leviathan.007
content: I've got some Dai tokens on BEP2 network and recently due to some changes I cannot swap the tokens.Anyone can suggest to me any reliable no kyc exchanges where I can deposit BEP2 dai tokens there and swap to btc/eth?

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: Bep2 is binance beacon chain right? If that's correct then you should know that dai in bep2 is available on binance exchange, I just checked you can make deposit in Dai bep20 chain to binance and withdraw in the same format too.

comments.author: vv181
comments.body: Quote from: Z390 on June 14, 2022, 07:55:14 PMBep2 is binance beacon chain right? If that's correct then you should know that dai in bep2 is available on binance exchange, I just checked you can make deposit in Dai bep20 chain to binance and withdraw in the same format too.Yes, but @OP will be subject to KYC.IIRC, Trust Wallet in-built swap/bridge feature might be able to convert the token. Though, I don't know for sure if directly converting DAI to some other token is available.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: I can suggest you these. 1. FTX, this exchange site doesn't need KYC if you are wanna sending your DAI but remember it has low limit which was around 2k USD for the new account (non verified).2. Kucoin exchange site. As far as i know this doesn't need KYC but there would be also limitation for the new account. As far as i can remember if the limit was around 2 bitcoin for daily withdrawal limit for non verified account. You can try to use both. If you are sending big amounts of DAI and you can use kucoin. FTX is very good exchange site.
